tool.name: tool_21
tool.displayname: Grids from Classified Grid and Table

param.name: TABLE
param.dialogReference:
Table

Table, input

The table with the (numeric) data values for each class. The tool creates a grid for each table column (besides the ID).

param.name: ID_FIELD
param.dialogReference:
Attribute

Table field

The attribute with the class IDs, used to link the table and the grid.

param.name: CLASSES
param.dialogReference:
Classes

Grid, input

The grid encoded with the class IDs.

param.name: GRIDS
param.dialogReference:
Grids

Grid list, output, optional

optional

The output grids, one grid for each table column.

tool.summary: The tool allows one to create grids from a classified grid and a corresponding lookup table. The table must provide an attribute with the class identifiers used in the grid, which is used to link the table and the grid. A grid is created for each additional attribute field found in the table.
